lead_paragraph: Josh Boone, a forward from the University of Connecticut whom the Nets selected with the 23rd pick in last month’s draft, had arthroscopic surgery yesterday for a torn labrum in his left shoulder. Boone was hurt in the summer league in Orlando, Fla., last week, Rod Thorn, the Nets’ president, said.
